attributes.action: Make hospital car parks charge a reasonable set rate for a short or longer stay.
attributes.additional_details: In many cases persons visiting family members and or friends on the ward will often stay on the ward for an hour or longer.  They are penalised often with a higher charge and if the stay is two to three hours, the car parking charge is often unreasonable.
attributes.background:
A hospital Car Park charged £3.20 for a 22 minute stay when a colleague collected me after an eye operation.  The first 20 minutes was
 free parking if a person waits just inside the front doors but in my case it was a long walk from and back to the car.
